text:
Dr. Raymond D* Cheydleur
January 20, 1958
Page 2
have some corrections on this report — for clarification
is nothing else — but think they can wait until we see the
entire document together* (By the way, l do not believe
that 1 was on the implementation committee* I never met
with them at Columbus*)
That seems to be it at this moment* You will hear
from me often, though, 1 am sure*
Cordially,
Sam L. Becker
Director, Division of
Television-Radio-Film
